    • 方法详细资料

      • checkCapacityBoundedness

        public static <P extends AbstractPlace<F,S>,T extends AbstractTransition<F,S>,F extends AbstractFlowRelation<P,T,S>,M extends AbstractMarking<S>,S> boolean checkCapacityBoundedness(AbstractPetriNet<P,T,F,M,S> petriNet)
        Checks if the given net is capacity bounded.
        A net is capacity bounded when all its places are bounded.
        参数:
        petriNet - The input Petri net.
        返回:
        The marking graph of the given Petri net.

      • initiateBoundednessCheck

        public static <P extends AbstractPlace<F,S>,T extends AbstractTransition<F,S>,F extends AbstractFlowRelation<P,T,S>,M extends AbstractMarking<S>,S> void initiateBoundednessCheck(AbstractPetriNet<P,T,F,M,S> petriNet,
                                                                                                                                                                                  de.invation.code.toval.thread.ExecutorListener<BoundednessCheckResult<P,T,F,M,S>> listener)
                                                                                                                                                                           throws BoundednessException
        Checks if the Petri net is bounded.
        In case the marking graph of the net cannot be constructed with the maximum number of elements (see MGConstruction.MAX_RG_CALCULATION_STEPS),
        it is assumed to be unbounded; otherwise bounded.
        参数:
        petriNet - The basic Petri net for operation.
        抛出:
        BoundednessException

      • initiateBoundednessCheck

        public static <P extends AbstractPlace<F,S>,T extends AbstractTransition<F,S>,F extends AbstractFlowRelation<P,T,S>,M extends AbstractMarking<S>,S> void initiateBoundednessCheck(BoundednessCheckGenerator<P,T,F,M,S> generator,
                                                                                                                                                                                  de.invation.code.toval.thread.ExecutorListener<BoundednessCheckResult<P,T,F,M,S>> listener)
                                                                                                                                                                           throws BoundednessException
        Checks if the Petri net is bounded.
        In case the marking graph of the net cannot be constructed with the maximum number of elements (see MGConstruction.MAX_RG_CALCULATION_STEPS),
        it is assumed to be unbounded; otherwise bounded.
        参数:
        generator - The boundedness check generator.
        抛出:
        BoundednessException

      • getBoundedness

        public static <P extends AbstractPlace<F,S>,T extends AbstractTransition<F,S>,F extends AbstractFlowRelation<P,T,S>,M extends AbstractMarking<S>,S> BoundednessCheckResult<P,T,F,M,S> getBoundedness(AbstractPetriNet<P,T,F,M,S> petriNet)
                                                                                                                                                                                              throws BoundednessException
        Checks if the Petri net is bounded.
        In case the marking graph of the net cannot be constructed with the maximum number of elements (see MGConstruction.MAX_RG_CALCULATION_STEPS),
        it is assumed to be unbounded; otherwise bounded.
        参数:

        抛出:
        BoundednessException

      • getBoundedness

        public static <P extends AbstractPlace<F,S>,T extends AbstractTransition<F,S>,F extends AbstractFlowRelation<P,T,S>,M extends AbstractMarking<S>,S> BoundednessCheckResult<P,T,F,M,S> getBoundedness(BoundednessCheckGenerator<P,T,F,M,S> generator)
                                                                                                                                                                                              throws BoundednessException
        Checks if the Petri net is bounded.
        In case the marking graph of the net cannot be constructed with the maximum number of elements (see MGConstruction.MAX_RG_CALCULATION_STEPS),
        it is assumed to be unbounded; otherwise bounded.
        参数:
        generator - The boundedness check generator.
        返回:
        The marking graph of the given Petri net.
        抛出:
        BoundednessException
